content.question: Which of the following was the most significant factor that contributed to the changes to Ottoman territory shown on the maps?

choices.label: Western European efforts to halt the spread of Islam in Europe
The spread of nationalism in the Balkans
The economic and social disruptions caused by the industrialization of the Ottoman Empire
The defeat of Napoleon by a coalition of conservative monarchies

content.answer: The spread of nationalism in the Balkans

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
